titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend the credits for residential energy efficient property and new energy efficient homes.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend the credits for residential energy efficient property and new energy efficient homes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the tax credits for expenditures for: (1) nonbusiness energy property; (2) residential energy efficient property; and (3) new energy efficient homes.
